section.title: disp
section.para: Display text - holds an alternative user-friendly display representation of the original data of the inline code.
section.programlisting:
<unit id="1">
  <originalData>
    <data id="d1">{1}</data>
  </originalData>
  <segment>
    <source>Welcome back <ph id="1" disp="[UserName]" dataRef="d1"/>!
        </source>
  </segment>
</unit>

"subfiles": [
  {
    "id": "1",
    "originalData": { "d1": "{1}" },
    "subunits": [
      {
        "kind": "segment",
        "source": [
          { "text": "Welcome back " },
          { "id": "1", "kind": "ph", "disp": "[UserName]", "dataRef": "d1" },
          { "text": "!" }
        ]
      }
    ]
  }
]

note.para: To provide a plain text equivalent of the code, use the equiv property.
